description: Tattooed hunk Dante Colle can’t seem to get a boner long enough to masturbate, but when he finally does get it up, he gets comfortable and starts masturbating the day away. Athletic cutie Shane Jackson just happened to be walking by his window and sneaks into the house to get an up-close-and-personal show. Dark-haired Dante is stunned to see him, but he's excited to bust another nut.
title: The Longest Erection of my Life Part 1: Bareback
